We use webcams for our vision processing and it can be very difficult to mount them accurately. We have designed a 3d printed case for the circuit, which is way easier to mount. Is it legal to remove the original case (strip the camera down to the PCB) and mount it on a 3d printed frame? I have not seen anything that disallows it, but I just want to make sure.
